name: Seat Fighter
description:
Desert Bus 2018 Game Jam submission. Theme: The Driver's Chair

The world's greatest chairs have gathered together to battle it out for a chance at the title of Driver's Chair, but only one can become... The King of Chairs. Will it be you?

Controls:

Arrows to move

Z to attack

ESC to quit

Click on-screen buttons

Credits:

Code and design by Glagha

Art assets and characters provided by Jexebele

Additional characters provided by Barnaby T Jones

Music from Jonathan So's Game Creator's Pack: https://jonathan-so.itch.io/creatorpack
